mst_quest.Name: First Formation!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 ships in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Destroyer Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have 4 DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Torpedo Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have a CL as a flagship and 4 DD in \nyour main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Six Ship Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 6 ships in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Squadron with Two Light Cruisers!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 CL in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Heavy Cruiser Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 CA in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Carrier Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Have a CV/CVL as a flagship and 3 DD \nin your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Tenryuu-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Tenryuu, and Tatsuta in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Sendai class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Sendai, Jintsuu, and Naka in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Myoukou-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara, and \nHaguro in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Fusou-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Ise-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Ise and Hyuuga in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Main Fleet with \na BB and CA!
mst_quest.Details: Have a BB and 2 CA in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the Nagumo Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu, and \nSouryuu in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Second Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have a flagship in your second fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Ready a Seaplane Tender!
mst_quest.Details: Have a Seaplane Tender in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Carrier Task Force in the \nSecond Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have a CV/CVL and 3 DD in your \nsecond fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Kongou-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna, and \nKirishima in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, \nTenryuu, and a FAST ship in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 6!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, \nand Ikazuchi in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Cruiser Division 4!
mst_quest.Details: Have Atago, Takao, Choukai, and \nMaya in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Nishimura Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, and \nShigure in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Carrier Division 5!
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 2 DD \nin your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the New Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, \nFurutaka, and Tenryuu in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Submarine Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 SS in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Naval Aviation \nStrike Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Medium-Sized Submarine Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 3 SS in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Cruiser Division 6!
mst_quest.Details: Have Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, and Kinugasa \nin your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the 5th Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama, and Kiso \nin your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Torpedo Squadron 1!
mst_quest.Details: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi \nand Shiranui in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 8!
mst_quest.Details: Have Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, \nand Arashio in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 18!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, \nand Shiranui in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 30 \n(First Generation)!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, \nand Mochizuki in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: In Preparation of Love! \n(Part 3)
mst_quest.Details: Have a level 90 to 99 ship as your \nflagship in your first fleet

mst_quest.Name: A New Voyage!
mst_quest.Details: Organize a fleet of 6 ships with your \nnewly bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship!

mst_quest.Name: Form the 30th Destroyer Fleet \n(Second Generation).
mst_quest.Details: Have only Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki, \nand Mochizuki in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the 5th Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Myoukou, Nachi, and Haguro in \nyour fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the new 2nd Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Hiryuu Kai Ni as the flagship, \nSouryuu, and 2 DDs in \nyour fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the 6th Submarine Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Have a submarine tender and 4 \n(or more) submarines in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Test the new RADAR!
mst_quest.Details: Have Myoukou Kai-Ni as the flagship \nof your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Reorganise the Strengthened \n2nd Carrier Division.
mst_quest.Details: Have Souryuu Kai-Ni as flagship \nwith Hiryuu Kai-Ni, and 2 \nDDs in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the New Unryuu-class \nAircraft Carriers
mst_quest.Details: Have Unryuu, Amagi or Katsuragi in \nyour first fleet as flagship

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Main Battleship Fleet: \nthe 2nd Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, and \nYamashiro in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise a Surface Attack Fleet with \nBattleships
mst_quest.Details: Have 3 BBs (Nagato-class, Ise-class, \nFusou-class, or Yamato-class) and 1 CL in a fleet

mst_quest.Name: Prepare the Arsenal for Renovations.
mst_quest.Details: Have Akashi as your flagship in \nyour main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Nishimura Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, \nand Michishio in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Counterattack Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Kasumi as the flagship, Ashigara, \n1 CL and 3 more DDs in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the 11th Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details:
Have the 4 Special-type destroyers: Fubuki, 
Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Murakumo in your 
main fleet. 
One of them should be the flagship.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the 21st Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have only Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, \nand Hatsushimo in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the 22nd Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have only Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, \nand 1 more DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the New Edition of the \nMikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Choukai Kai-Ni as the flagship and \nany five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, \nTenryuu, Yuubari in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 18th Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and 2 or more \nother ships in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the surface attack fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, \nIkazuchi, Inazuma in your fleet

mst_quest.Name: Organize the new 6th \nDestroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Akatsuki Kai-Ni as Flagship with \nHibiki/Bep, Ikazuchi, Inazuma in \nyour fleet

mst_quest.Name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for \na Rush to the Northern Sea!
mst_quest.Details: Have Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, \nHatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and \nShimakaze in your main fleet

mst_quest.Name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for \nAnother Rush to the Northern Sea!
mst_quest.Details: Have Abukuma Kai-Ni as flagship with \nHibiki/Вер, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and \nShimakaze in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Assign the KanOsamu Murata Corps to \nAkagi！
mst_quest.Details: Have Akagi as your Secretary ship and \nasign the Murata Corps to her.

mst_quest.Name: Assign the KanOsamu Corps to \nShokaku!
mst_quest.Details: Have Shokaku as your Secretary ship \nand asign the Murata Corps to her.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the Third Fleet Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Form a fleet with Shokaku as Flagship \nalong with Zuikaku, and Zuihou.

mst_quest.Name: Reorganize the 5th Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro and \nAkigumo in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Prepare the New 21st Squadron \nfor Sortie！
mst_quest.Details: Have Nachi Kai-Ni, Ashigara Kai-Ni, \nTama and Kiso in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 16th Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Ashigara as flagship, \nKuma and Nagara in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 3rd Carrier Division.
mst_quest.Details: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, \nChitose, and Chiyoda (both as CVL, not AV) \nin your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 4th Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your \nmain fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize Ozawa's Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, \nChitose and Chiyoda (both as CVL), \nIse Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet!

mst_quest.Name: Organize the New Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Zuikaku Kai Ni, Shoukaku Kai Ni \nand two DDs in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 16th Squadron \n(Second Generation)!
mst_quest.Details: Have Natori as flagship, Isuzu and Kinu \nin your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the New Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 CV, 2 BBV/CAV and 2 DD \nin your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise a Forced High-speed \nTransport Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Sendai Kai Ni as flagship, \nKawakaze Kai, Shigure Kai Ni and \ntwo other DDs in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize a powerful \nSubmarine Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have a level 80 Submarine as flagship \nwith atleast 3 other lvl 40 \nSubmarines in any of your fleets

mst_quest.Name: Organize a powerful \n"Aviation Battleship" squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Ise Kai, Hyuga Kai, Fuso Kai-Ni, \nand 2 DDs in a fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Crush the Enemy Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Defeat an enemy fleet.

mst_quest.Name: "First Sortie!"
mst_quest.Details: Deploy your main fleet on a combat \nmission.

mst_quest.Name: Guard the Sea in Front of the \nNaval Base!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V1-1 in the \nNaval District Sea and clear the stage.

mst_quest.Name: Guard the sea near Naval \nPrefecture!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V1-2 in the\nNaval District Sea and clear the stage

mst_quest.Name: Intercept Approaching Enemy \nVanguard Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V1-2 (again) in the\nNaval District Sea and clear the stage

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Torpedo Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with a CL as flagship and \n3 DD as escorts.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy a Heavy Cruiser!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with a CA as its \nflagship.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy a Battleship!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a BB!

mst_quest.Name: Deploy a Carrier Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: "Deploy a fleet with CV(L) as flagship \nand 5 DD/CL/AV for the escorts.

mst_quest.Name: Ambush the Enemy Fleet With \nAll Your Might!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie 8 times before the end of \nthe month

mst_quest.Name: Sink Enemy Carriers!
mst_quest.Details: Sink 2 Enemy Carriers.

mst_quest.Name: Strike the Enemy Transport Group!
mst_quest.Details: Sink 2 enemy Transport Ships in a \nmonth.

mst_quest.Name: Maritime Trade Disrupt Operation!
mst_quest.Details: Sink 5 or more Enemy Transport Ships \nin a month.

mst_quest.Name: Operation A-gou!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy your fleet several times and \ndefeat 10 to 12 Bosses in a month.

mst_quest.Name: Second Fleet Sortie!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy your 2nd Fleet on a combat \nmission.

mst_quest.Name: Ambush an Enemy Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Defeat an enemy fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Crush The Enemy Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Sink an enemy aircraft carrier.

mst_quest.Name: Shred Enemy Supply lines!
mst_quest.Details: Sink 3 enemy transport ships.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, \nand Tenryuu, with one additional \nfast ship to any stage.

mst_quest.Name: Operation I-gou!
mst_quest.Details: Sink as many enemy carriers as you \ncan in a month.

mst_quest.Name: Operation Ro-gou!
mst_quest.Details: Sink as many enemy transport ships \nas you can in a month.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 6th Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki, \nHibiki/Вер, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 4th Cruiser Division!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with Atago, Takao, Choukai, \nMaya and any 2 ships. Score a victory \nagainst the V1-4 Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Nishimura Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, \nand 2 additional ships to the World V9-4 in /nthe Southern Connecting Sea and defeat the \nBoss with a B rank victory.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 5th Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 4 additional \nships to V11-4 in the Central Western Sea \nand defeat the Boss with an A rank victory.

mst_quest.Name: Establish Naval Supremacy in \nthe Souther Waters!
mst_quest.Details: Achieve 4 A Rank Boss battle victories \nin a month in the South Anchorage Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the New Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Choukai, Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, \nKinugasa, and Tenryuu to \nSouth Anchorage Sea V7-2.

mst_quest.Name: Marine Escort Battle!
mst_quest.Details: Sink 8 Submarines.

mst_quest.Name: Defend the Anchorage
mst_quest.Details: Defeat 3 Boss Nodes in \nWest Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Suppress the Enemy Submarines!
mst_quest.Details: Sink 4 enemy submarines in a month.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Submarine Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with 2 or more SS. \nScore a B Rank victory against the \nWorld V11-2 Boss in the Central Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy an Aviation Surface \nAttack Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy 2 CAVs, 2 BBVs, and 2 additional \nships to World V8-4 in the North Anchorage Sea\nand Score an S rank victory against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 6th Cruiser Division!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Aoba, Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, and 
2 additional ships to World V11-3 in the 
Central Western Sea and obtain an S-Rank 
at the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Patrol the Northern Strait!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V8-2 in the North \nAnchorage Sea and score 3 S rank \nvictories against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Control South Connecting Sea zone!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V9-1 in the South \nConnecting Sea and Achieve B+ Rank at \nthe Boss Node.

mst_quest.Name: Anti Submarine Patrol Track \nAnchorage!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V7-1 in the South Anchorage Sea and destroy \nenemy submarines.

mst_quest.Name: Support the Defense Line!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V1-4 and Achieve a \nB+ Rank at the Boss Node.

mst_quest.Name: South Contact Waters Anti \nSub Patrol！
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V9-2 in the South \nConnecting Sea and Achieve B+ Rank \nat the Boss Node.

mst_quest.Name: Advance to the Western Region of \nOrel Bay!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V11-2 in the \nCentral Western Sea and get at least \nan S rank on the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "18th Destroyer Division"!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui, \nand 2 additional ships to World V3-1 in the Northern Sea \nand Score an S Rank Victory against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Eliminate Enemy Northern Fleet \nMain Force！
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V3-3 and V3-4 in \nthe Northern Sea and defeat the Bosses.

mst_quest.Name: Destroy Enemy Eastern Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V4-4 in the \nWestern Sea and defeat the Boss \nwith at least an A Rank Victory.

mst_quest.Name: Gain Air Superiority at the Coral \nIslands in the Southern Sea Region!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V5-2 in the \nSouthern Sea and defeat the Boss \ntwo times with an S Rank Victory.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Destroyer Division 30 \n(First Generation)!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy a fleet that consists of Mutsuki, 
Kisaragi, Yayoi, Mochizuki and up to 2 
additional DDs or 1 DD with 1 CL as flagship to World 
V3-2 in the Northern Sea and encounter the Boss. 
C rank or above is required.

mst_quest.Name: Prepare for the Ceremony Final!
mst_quest.Details:
Obtain S-rank victory at the Boss node 
of World V11-2 in the Central Western 
Sea with a ship between Lv90 and 99 
as the first fleet flagship.

mst_quest.Name: A Couple's First Quest!
mst_quest.Details: Score an S rank victory over the Boss \nin the World V4-3 in the Western Sea with a \nlevel 100+ flagship in your first fleet.

mst_quest.Name: "Aviation Battleship" Weigh Anchor!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet \nand score a victory against \nWorld V4-1 Boss in the Western Sea

mst_quest.Name: "30th Destroyer Division" \nAnti-Submarine Patrol!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and 
Mochizuki to World V7-1 in the South Anchorage Sea 
and achieve atleast an A Rank Victory 
against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "5th Squadron"!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro, \n+3 ships to World V11-4 in the Central Western Sea \nand achieve an S-rank the Boss node

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Newly-Formed \n"2nd Carrier Division"!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Hiryuu Kai Ni as the flagship, \nSouryuu and two DDs to World V5-2 in the Southern Sea. You may add 2 other ships. \nScore an S rank victory against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Elite "2nd Carrier Division" \nWeigh Anchor!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Souryuu Kai Ni as the flagship, 
Hiryuu Kai Ni and two DDs to World V4-3 
in the Western Sea. You may add 2 other ships. 
Score an S rank victory against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 601st Naval Air Group
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Unryuu, Amagi or Katsuragi as 
flagship with 5 additional ships to the 
World 7-3 in the South Anchorage Sea and 
score an S rank victory against the Boss！

mst_quest.Name: "Light Carrier Squadron", \nDeploy!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy 1-2 CVLs, 1 CL, and 3-4 DDs 
to World V11-1 in the Central Western Sea 
and score an S rank victory 
over the Boss!

mst_quest.Name: The Torpedo Squadron Bashi \nIsland Emergency Deployment!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy 1-2 CLs (with 1 as flagship) and 
4-5 DDs, and no ships from any other classes. 
Obtain S-rank victory at the Boss node of 
World V11-1 in the Central Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "Submarine Fleet"!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy a fleet with only 3 or more Submarines 
to world V6-1 in the Central Sea 
and score an S rank at the Boss node 
3 times.

mst_quest.Name: Torpedo Squadron, toward Southwest!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy 1-3 CLs, with one as 
flagship, and 3-5 DDs to World V1-4 in 
the Naval District Sea and 
obtain an S-Rank at the Boss

mst_quest.Name: "2nd Squadron" Weigh Anchor!
mst_quest.Details:
With a fleet consisting of Nagato, 
Mutsu, Fusou, and Yamashiro obtain an 
S-rank victory 2 times at the 
Boss node of World V4-1 in the Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: "Surface Strike Fleet" to the S\nouth!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy a fleet with only 3 of the following classes: 
Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class and Fusou-class 
Slow Battleships, 1 CL and 2 additional ships 
to World V5-1 in the Southern Sea and defeat the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: "Battleship Squadron" Charge \ninto the Northern Sea Region!
mst_quest.Details: With a fleet containg atleast 2 BBs and 1 CVL obtain an \nS-rank victory at the Boss node \nof World V3-3 in the Northern Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Ensure the South Contact Line.
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to the World V9-4 in the Southern \nConnecting Sea and get at least \nan A rank at the Boss

mst_quest.Name: Advance the "Nishimura Fleet" \nto the Southern Sea Region!
mst_quest.Details:
With Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, 
Shigure, and Michishio and an additional 
ship obtain S-rank victory at the 
Boss node of World V5-1 in the Southern Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 6th Squadron to the \nOrel Sea!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, 
and up to two additional ships to World V11-3 in 
the Central Western Sea and score an S rank 
victory at the Boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Mobile Carrier Fleet to the West!
mst_quest.Details:
With 2 Carriers (CV, CVL, or Taihou) and 2 DD.
You may add 2 additional ships.
Obtain S-rank victory at the Boss node 
of World V4-1 in the Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Control the Sea Resources!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to the World V2-3 in the \nNansei Islands and clear it.

mst_quest.Name: "Surface Counterattack Fleet" Charge!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy 2 DD(Flag) + 1 CA + 1 CL + 2 ships to \n Central Western Sea V11-4 and score an \nS-rank the Boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "11th Destroyer Division"!
mst_quest.Details:
With Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo 
obtain a A-rank or better result 
at the Boss node of World V11-1 in the 
Central Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Capture the SW Fortress!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy to World V10-3 in the \nSouthwestern Sea and clear it.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 21st Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Hatsuharu, Hatsushimo, Nenohi, Wakaba 
and two additional ships to World V3-1 
in the Northern Sea and score 
an S rank victory at the Boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "22nd Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 more DD 
and up to two additional ships to 
World V1-4 in the Naval District Sea and 
score an S rank victory at the Boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Weigh Anchor, "Nachi Squadron"!
mst_quest.Details:
With Nachi (as flagship), Hatsushimo, Kasumi, 
Ushio, Akebono, and 1 other ship. 
Obtain S-rank victory at the Boss node 
of World V11-1 in the Central Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Remodeled Anti-Air \nHeavy Cruiser!
mst_quest.Details:
Deploy Maya (Kai or Kai ni), and 3 DDs 
(you may add additional ships) to V7-2 in the 
South Anchorage Sea and obtain an S-Rank 
at the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Newly-Formed "Mikawa Fleet" to \nthe Solomon Region!
mst_quest.Details:
With Choukai Kai Ni (flagship) plus 5 ships 
from the following: Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, 
Kinugasa, Yuubari and Tenryuu. Obtain S-rank 
victory at the Boss node of World V5-1 in the 
Southern Sea.

mst_quest.Name: "6th Destroyer Division" \nAnti-Submarine Patrol!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki/Вер, Ikazuchi, and 
Inazuma to V9-2 in 
the Southern Connecting Sea and obtain a 
C-Rank or better at the Boss, Akatsuki must 
be flagship.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 18th Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least 2 \nother ships to World V9-1 in the Southern \nConnecting Sea and S-rank the Boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the surface attack fleet!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, 
Ikazuchi, Inazuma to V5-3 in the 
Southern Sea and clear the stage 
with an S-rank.

mst_quest.Name: "6th Destroyer Division" Thorough \nAnti-Submarine Patrol!
mst_quest.Details:
With Akatsuki Kai-Ni, Hibiki/Вер Ikazuchi, 
Inazuma and two other ships, obtain A-rank 
at the Boss node of World V9-1 
in the Southern Connecting Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the [First Torpedo Squadron] \nfor operation K-Go!
mst_quest.Details:
Abukuma(flagship), Hibiki, Yuugumo, Naganami, 
Akigumo, and Shimakaze in the same fleet. 
Get at least an S rank at 
the Boss of World V3-2 in the Northern Sea.

mst_quest.Name: [First Torpedo Squadron], advance \nagain to the Northern K-Go Operation
mst_quest.Details:
Abukuma(flagship), Hibiki, Yuugumo, Naganami, 
Akigumo, and Shimakaze in the same fleet. 
Get at least an S rank at the Boss 
of World V3-2 in the Northern Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Patrol the Northern Sea!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World V3-1 in the \nNorthern Sea and defeat the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Feint Maneuver, Excute operation AL!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World V13-2 and V13-3 in \nthe AL Sea and Score S rank \nvictories against both Bosses.

mst_quest.Name: Forward! Operation MI!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie to all four stages of World V12 
in the MI Sea and clear them 
with atleast an A rank Victory on 
each Boss.

mst_quest.Name: The Western Dispatch Fleet Sorties！
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World V4 in the Western Sea \nand defeat all 4 Bosses with \natleast an A rank Victory.

mst_quest.Name: Decisive Battle Operation FS!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to V14-4 in the FS Sea \nand defeat the Boss with atleast \na B rank victory.

mst_quest.Name: Crush Port Wine!
mst_quest.Details: With a Carrier as your flagship deploy to \nWorld V2-4 in the Nansei Islands \nand score an A rank victory against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Calais Ocean Manuevers
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World V4-1 in the Western Sea \nand defeat the Boss node

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the "5th Carrier Division \nto the South
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo 
and up to 2 additional ships to World V5-2 in the 
Southern Sea and score an S-rank 
victory at the Boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the New 21st Squadron \nto the North!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Nachi(Kai-2), Ashigara(Kai-2), Tama, \nKiso and up to 2 additional ships to \nV13-2 in the AL Sea and S-Rank the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 16th Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Ashigara(Flagship), Kuma, Nagara \nand up to 3 additional ships to World 8-3 \nin the North Anchorage Sea and clear the stage.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 8th Destroyer Squadron!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie Asashio, Michishio, Oshio, Arashio and 
up to 2 additional ships to V11-2 in the 
Central Western Sea and score an 
S-Rank victory against the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Beyond Iron Bottom Straight!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet to World V5-4 in \nthe Southern Sea and defeat the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Abyssal Canal Offensive!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World V16-3 in the Deep Sea Canal \nand defeat the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Third Aeronautical Squadron!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, 
Chitose Carrier and Chiyoda Carrier 
(both as CVL and you can add 2 more ships) to 
V1-4 in the Naval District Sea and score an 
S-rank victory at the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Ozawa's fleet!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, 
Chitose and Chiyoda (both as CVL), Ise Kai 
and Hyuuga Kai to World V11-4 in the Central 
Western Sea and score an S-rank victory at the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 16th Squadron \n(Second Generation)!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Natori as flagship, Isuzu, Kinu \nand up to 3 additional ships to World V4-2 in \nthe Western Sea and score an S-rank at the Boss.

mst_quest.Name: New Carrier Division, \nAdvance to the North!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie 2CV, 2DD and 1BBV or 2CAV 
in the first fleet to world V3-4 in the 
Northern Sea and beat the boss 
with an S rank!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out "Operation Rei-go"!
mst_quest.Details:
Kasumi (as flagship), Ashigara, Ooyodo, 
Asashimo, and Kiyoshimo. You may add 1 other ship. 
Obtain an S-rank victory at the Boss 
node of World V11-2 in the Central Western Sea.

mst_quest.Name: Truk Anchorage Patrol
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to Southern Harbor V7-2 in \nthe South Anchorage Sea and clear it

mst_quest.Name: The Battleship Yamato Sorties!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Yamato as flagship and 5 additional \nships to V12-3 in the MI Sea and \ndefeat the Boss

mst_quest.Name: Your First 「Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: Perform the 「Fleet Movement Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Carry out the 「Shelling Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: In order to improve the fighting skill of the fleet,\n perform the 「Shelling Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the 「Torpedo Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: In order to improve the fighting skill of the fleet,\n perform the 「Torpedo Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Continue Carrying Out the \n「Shelling Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: In order to improve the fighting skill of the fleet,\n do the 「Shelling Exercise」 3 more times!

mst_quest.Name: Carry out 「Exercises」 to Increase \nNight Battle Proficiency!
mst_quest.Details: Do 「Fleet Movement Exercise」 three times and \n「Torpedo Exercise」 three times!

mst_quest.Name: Prepare for the Ceremony! \n(Part 2)
mst_quest.Details: Do more than 5 「Rival Exercises」 in a month, \n attempting to sort through the feelings of the ceremony!

mst_quest.Name: Improve Fleet discipline \nbefore maneuvers
mst_quest.Details: Do 「Rival Exercise」 3 times in a month!

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen fleet discipline!
mst_quest.Details: Aim for further improvement of fleet! \nContinue 「Rival Exercise」 4 or more times this month!

mst_quest.Name: Preparing to retake the north, \nimprove fleet discipline!
mst_quest.Details: In preparation for the fleet re-entry, \n do 「Fleet Movement Exercise」 3 times!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Shelling Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Weekday gold! \nContinue the 「Shelling Exercise」 5 more times!

mst_quest.Name: Strive to Increase the Fleet's \nNight Battle Proficiency!
mst_quest.Details: Improve Night Battle Proficiency! \n Do both 「Movement」 and 「Torpedo」 exercises 5 times each!

mst_quest.Name: Intensify the 「Anti-Submarine \nWarfare Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: Improve the fleet anti-submarine proficiency!\n Do the 「Anti-Submarine Warfare Exercise」 three more times!

mst_quest.Name: Strive for proficiency!
mst_quest.Details: Improve the overall proficiency of the fleet! \nPerform 3 「General Exercises」!

mst_quest.Name: Intensify the 「Aerial \nBattle Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Improve fleet's aviation skill level! \nDo the 「Aerial Battle Exercise」 three more times!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out a 「Rival Exercise」 \nAmong Friends!
mst_quest.Details: Practice fleet exercises! \n Do 「Rival Exercises」 more than 5 times this month!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the 「Anti-Submarine \nWarfare Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: In order to improve proficiency of the fleet against submarines,\n perform the 「Anti-Submarine Warfare Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the 「Rival Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: Carry out simulated combat exercises between fleets! \nPerform a 「Rival Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the 「Aerial Battle \nExercise」!
mst_quest.Details: In order to improve the aerial fighting skill of the fleet, \n perform the 「Aerial Battle Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the 「General Exercise」!
mst_quest.Details: In order to improve the overall fighting skill\n of the fleet, perform the 「General Exercise」!

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Expedition"
mst_quest.Details: Send a fleet on an expedition.

mst_quest.Name: Fleet Expedition implementation
mst_quest.Details: Perform 3 successful expeditions \nby the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Fleet Expedition implementation 2
mst_quest.Details: Perform 10 successful expeditions \nby the end of the month！

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen southern transport \noperations
mst_quest.Details: Do 12 successful transport fleet \nexpeditions in Southern Connecting Sea \nduring the same month

mst_quest.Name: Submarine Dispatch Operations
mst_quest.Details: Complete the fourth expedition \n[Submarine Voyage] in the Southwestern Sea

mst_quest.Name: 2nd Submarine dispatch Operations
mst_quest.Details: Complete the fourth expedition \n[Submarine Voyage] in the Southwestern Sea \none more time

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen maritime escort \nanti submarine operations
mst_quest.Details: Perform the maritime escort and anti-submarine expeditions！

mst_quest.Name: Obtain Technology through \nSubmarine Dispatch Operations
mst_quest.Details: Complete the fourth expedition \n[Submarine Voyage]in the Southwestern Sea \ntwo more times

mst_quest.Name: Contact Foreign Ship through \nSubmarine Dispatch
mst_quest.Details: Complete the third expedition \n[Submarine Voyage Drill] in the Southwestern \nSea

mst_quest.Name: Carry out a [Tokyo Express] \nto the southern sea!
mst_quest.Details: Send a fleet of a CL as core \nand destroyers with drum canisters for \n[Tokyo Express] expedition in the Southern Sea

mst_quest.Name: Continue the [Tokyo Express] \nto the southern sea!
mst_quest.Details: Carry out the [Tokyo Express] \nmissions of the Southern Sea and \nclear them 6 times.

mst_quest.Name: Operation Hoku-Gou!
mst_quest.Details: Send a fleet with 2 BBVs as \nits core and DDs to the 4th expedition \nof the Nansei Islands

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen Operation Hoku-Gou!
mst_quest.Details:
Send a fleet with 2 BBVs as 
its core and DDs to the 4th 
expedition of the Nansei Islands 
and clear it 3 times.

mst_quest.Name: Central Western sea submarine patrol
mst_quest.Details: Send a fleet of 3 submarines to \nthe 4th expedition [Submarine Patrol] of \nthe Central Western Sea twice

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out Distant Ocean \nSubmarine Operation!
mst_quest.Details: Carry out "Distant Ocean Submarine Operation" \nto increase the submarine fleet's \nexperience and reduce the enemy fleet! twice

mst_quest.Name: Perform the Air Defense Exercises!
mst_quest.Details: Complete the 4th Naval Base \nExpedition [Anti-aircraft Drill] 2 times

mst_quest.Name: Decoy Mobile Fleet Support \nOperation!!
mst_quest.Details: Dispatch a fleet for the 6th expedition \n[Decoy Mobile Fleet Support Operations] \nof the South Connecting Sea!

mst_quest.Name: Perform the Fleet Review \nRehearsal!
mst_quest.Details: Prepare a fleet for the 5th expedition \n[Fleet Review Rehearsal] of the Naval District \nSea and clear it 2 times!

mst_quest.Name: Perform the Fleet Review!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet for the 6th expedition \n[Fleet Review] of the Naval District Sea \nand clear it!

mst_quest.Name: Actively Manage the Aircraft \nCarrier Division!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie fleets for the 4th expedition 
[Operation MO] of the Southern Sea and 2nd expedition 
[Airstrike Operation Against Enemy Homeport] 
in the Western Sea!

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen the technology available \nby submarine dispatch!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet for the 4th expedition \n[Submarine Voyage] of the Southwest Sea and clear it 10 times!

mst_quest.Name: Overseas ship relief by submarine \ndispatch operations!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet for the 3rd expedition \n[Contacting Foreign Ship] of the Western Sea and clear it 5 times!

mst_quest.Name: Carry out the Overseas \nPractice Voyage!
mst_quest.Details:
Sortie fleets for 4th expedition 
[Cross-Oceanic Training Trip] of the Central Sea 
and the 4th expedition [South-East Asian 
Cross-Oceanic Training Trip] of FS Sea!

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Resupply"!
mst_quest.Details: Resupply a Ship.

mst_quest.Name: "First Docking"
mst_quest.Details: Repair a Ship.

mst_quest.Name: The Fleet's Large Maintenance
mst_quest.Details: Repair 10 Ships

mst_quest.Name: Fleet Bartender's Festival!
mst_quest.Details: Perform resupply to 30 or more ships!

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Construction"!
mst_quest.Details: Construct one Ship

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Development"!
mst_quest.Details: Develop one piece of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Dismantling"!
mst_quest.Details: Dismantle a ship you don't need \nat the factory!

mst_quest.Name: The First Scrapping
mst_quest.Details: Scrap a piece of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Instructions to Develop \nNew Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Craft a piece of equipment

mst_quest.Name: New Ship "Construction" \nOrder
mst_quest.Details: Construct a new ship girl today \nat the factory!

mst_quest.Name: Intensify the Concentration \nin Developing Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Craft 5 pieces of equipment (Failures are OK)

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen the Fleet by \nConstructing Ship Girls
mst_quest.Details: Construct 5 ships

mst_quest.Name: Response to Disarmament Treaty
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 2 ships

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for Large Ship \nConstruction!(Part 2)
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 5 pieces of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for the Ceremony \n(Part I)
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 3 pieces of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Preparing Drum Canisters for \nTransportation
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 3 pieces of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Recycling Resources
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 20 pieces of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion \n(Tomonaga Squadron to Tenzan)
mst_quest.Details: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 \nTorpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), \nthen scrap 2 Tenzan.

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion \n(Egusa Squadron to Suisei)
mst_quest.Details: Have flagship equipped with Type 99 \nDive Bomber (Egusa Squadron), \nthen scrap 2 Suisei.

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion \n(601 Air Group to Reppuu)
mst_quest.Details: Have flagship equipped with Zero Fighter \nType 52 Type C (601 Air Group), \nthen scrap 2 Reppuu

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for Irako
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment 10 times

mst_quest.Name: The First Equipment \nImprovement
mst_quest.Details: Do equipment modernization 1 time

mst_quest.Name: Reinforce Equipment \nImprovement
mst_quest.Details: Do equipment modernization 1 time

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion: \nType 97 Torpedo Bomber
mst_quest.Details:
Have a Skilled Crew Member in your item page 
and Equip a rank 7 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber on a 
Carrier Secretary in your first fleet, 
then scrap 2 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber.

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion: \nType 99 Dive Bomber
mst_quest.Details:
Have a Skilled Crew Member in your item page 
and Equip a rank 7 Type 99 Dive Bomber on a 
Carrier Secretary in your first fleet, 
then scrap 2 Type 99 Dive Bomber.

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion \n(Murata Squadron to Tenzan)
mst_quest.Details:
Have Shoukaku equipped with Type 97 
Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) as 
flagship and then scrap 2 Tenzan 
(Heavenly Mountain)

mst_quest.Name: Organize the Elite Type 97 \nTorpedo Bomber Force
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku or Akagi as flagship \nand then scrap 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber

mst_quest.Name: Preparation of the \nPrototype Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment 7 times

mst_quest.Name: Organize the New Elite \nFighter Force
mst_quest.Details:
Have Skilled Crew Member, Equip Rank 7 
Type 0 Fighter Model 21 on Houshou Secretary, 
then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 
and a Type 96 Fighter

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion: Type 0 Fighter \nModel 21 (Skilled)
mst_quest.Details: Equip a Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) \non a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 \nType 0 Fighter Model 52"

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion: Reppuu \n(Strong Gale)
mst_quest.Details:
Equip a rank 7 Reppuu (Strong Gale) on a 
Carrier secretary in your first fleet, 
then scrap 1 Reppuu (Strong Gale) and 
1 Type 0 Fighter Model 52

mst_quest.Name: Organize the elite New-Type \nZuiun squad!
mst_quest.Details: Equip a rank 7(max) Zuiun(634 Air Group) \nto secretary ship (BBV or CAV) and \nscrap a Zuiun Model 12 and 2 Zuiun.

mst_quest.Name: The First Modernization
mst_quest.Details: Perform a successful modernization

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out Ship Modernizations
mst_quest.Details: Perform 2 successful modernizations \nby the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Proceed with Modernization, \nand Prepare for War
mst_quest.Details: Perform 10 successful modernizations \nby the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for Large Ship Construction \n(Part I)
mst_quest.Details: Perform 4 successful modernizations
